<title
    level="1"
    right="Shield 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Fortress Shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=7)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Hefty 14" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=478" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 20 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
**Price** 20 gp

**AC Bonus** 3 (+4<sup>2</sup>)

**Speed Penalty** -10 ft.
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Bulk** 5

**Hardness** 6

**HP (BT)** 24 (12)
</row>

</column>

---

Also known as portable walls, these thick and heavy shields are slightly larger than [tower shields](/Shields.aspx?ID=4). Like tower shields, they're typically made from wood reinforced with metal, but many are made from larger amounts of metal or even stone.

 <sup>2</sup> Getting the higher bonus for a fortress shield requires using the [Take Cover](/Actions.aspx?ID=90) action while the shield is raised.
name: Fortress Shield
